movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: Flawed but positive start to the prequels
review:
The visuals are stunning and were groundbreaking back in 99.
Too much politics for some people but I found it realistic and engaging.
It has its problems but the good stuff outweighs the bad stuff.
All the Maul scenes are great. Mcgregor is great choice as Kenobi and then dual at then end is flat out stunning - even now it holds up and is better than anything in the new Disney flicks!

movie_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
title: Authentic Star Wars
review:
This one stays true to the originals.
The tone, the visuals are great with great battles and a Vader scene that will blow your mind!

title: Fun and trippy
review:
Very fun and trippy. Reminded me alot of Flash Gordon.
Too much humor though throughout even in the serious scenes.
Odins arc should have been better

title: Good
review: Love the world Guillermo del Toro created. The colours and tone are amazing. Overall a very good film

title: Good
review:
Love the world Guillermo del Toro created. The colours and tone is amazing.
Overall a very good film

title: Suprisingly Good
review:
Wasn't expecting much. Had never heard of the character.
Exceeded expectations. Is a good, fun film.

title: Flawed but fun film
review:
Seems to be trying to be more Marvel-esque..
Some great scenes

title: Is as good as the trailers suggest
review:
Perhaps the best Marvel film.
Cap and Tony both make you feel for their cause.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
title: Brilliant conclusion to the prequel triology
review:
Underrated but very good conclusion to the prequels. A major jump up in quality.
Links up episode 3 to the original films perfectly.
The battle scenes, the lightsaver duals - Anakin versus Kenobi, Windu versus Sidious and Yoda versus Sidious are all awesome.
A must watch.

movie_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
title: Underrated
review:
Loved the dark and different tone.
Affleck is great as Batman.
Will age well.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
title: Rehash
review:
Is a poor cheesy reboot of the originals.
Even the worst of the prequels had a strong story with scenes you could enjoy again and again. Not so with this.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
title: Rehash
review:
A cheesy and not that good reboot of the originals.
Even in the worst of the prequels there was a strong story with scenes that you could watch again and again. Not so in this one.
